backend/main.mo: Defines types and in‑memory maps for shipments, invoices, clients, payments, sessions, and OTPs, with rate‑limit logic and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related frontend files, components, and test references for client portal authentication flows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/.env: Environment file providing the Google Maps API key for the frontend.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component handling landing page sections, client/admin login flows, shipment tracking, and lazy‑loaded dashboards with scroll logic.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminClien: Displays a client's profile details and provides tabs for viewing associated shipments and invoices.
Form for creating or updating a client profile, including validation and mutation handling.
Dialog workflow for creating and provisioning a client account, including password generation and principal validation.
Lists all client accounts with search, refresh, and selection capabilities.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminDashb: Main admin interface providing navigation between clients, tracking, revenue, login history, and configuration panels.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminGoogl: Interface to configure and store a Google Geocoding API key with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminInvoi: Button to export all invoices as a CSV file using a backend mutation.
Renders an admin table for viewing, creating, updating, and deleting client invoices with a form dialog and status helpers.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Displays recent login history with loading, error, and empty states using a table layout.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMsg91: Provides UI to view, store, and verify the MSG91 API key with status indicators and form inputs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminReven: Shows revenue analytics with loading and error states and renders a line chart of paid invoice amounts.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoleM: Static panel explaining that role management is disabled under password-only authentication.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminShipm: Renders an admin table for managing client shipments, including creation, deletion, and optional coordinate handling.
frontend/src/components/AdminTrackingPan: Admin panel component that conditionally loads Google Maps and renders shipment markers using useGetAllShipmentsForMap.
frontend/src/components/app/AppErrorBoun: Provides a React error boundary that displays error details and offers refresh and copy-to-clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message when a user lacks permission to view a section.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminBootst: Deprecated admin bootstrap UI informing users that identity-based setup is unavailable.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLoginC: Renders a password-based admin login form with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminLogout: Provides a logout button that ends the admin session and scrolls back to the home section.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated Internet Identity login button that returns null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Deprecated profile setup dialog containing a form for company details.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientDas: Client dashboard showing tabs for shipments and invoices with logout and support actions.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientInv: Loads and displays client invoices with status badges, authentication checks, and error states.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPas: Provides a password change form with validation and mutation handling for clients required to update temporary passwords.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientPor: Displays login and signup tabs for the client portal and switches views based on user actions.
Implements client login via password or OTP, including form validation and query-based authentication.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientShi: Fetches and displays a client’s active and delivered shipments with authentication and error handling states.
frontend/src/components/client/ClientSig: Renders a signup form for new clients, validating identifiers and passwords before submitting the signup mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/ClientSessionProvider: Manages client session tokens via context, providing auth state and helpers to set or clear the token.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminBootstrap.ts: Provides hooks to check admin bootstrap status and trigger initial admin creation using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session tokens, validates them via actor calls, and handles login with detailed error mapping.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for client signup, login, OTP flow, and related backend interactions with error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures global styles, Tailwind layers, theme variables, and custom gold utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/invoicePdf.ts: Generates a printable HTML invoice PDF in a new window using provided invoice data.
frontend/src/lib/types.ts: Defines local client-related types and re-exports shipment and invoice types from the backend.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Generates WhatsApp deep links for payment reminders and support messages with formatted content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/clientAuthErrors.ts: Maps various auth and network error formats to short user-friendly messages with pattern-based handling and backend variant support.
frontend/src/utils/clientIdentifier.ts: Validates and normalizes email or mobile identifiers, returning standardized error messages and cleaned values.
frontend/src/utils/queryErrorMessage.ts: Converts React Query errors into safe user-facing messages, delegating auth-related cases to the auth error mapper.
frontend/src/utils/scrollToSection.ts: Smoothly scrolls the page to a DOM element by ID with a fixed header offset.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state and requirements related to re-enabling client portal login and signup flows and implementing needed auth APIs.
